622160.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Tyranny 3 (Token Pack)
622160.description:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 3

This product depicts 58 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Hunters, Winged Kobolds, Dragonclaws, Violet Fungi, Stirges, Dragonborn, Troglodytes, Guard Drakes, Kobolds, Beserkers, Roper, Kobolds with bombs, Guards, Cultists, both male and female, Dragon Eggs, both cracked open and whole. And as a bonus I have included 4 treasure chests, both opened and closed along with 2 other bonus tokens from Pack 2.
This Token Pack includes:
  • 5 Chests
  • 7 different colored Dragon Eggs
  • Dragonborn Champion
  • 2 Dragonclaws
  • 2 Female Cultists
  • Female Head Cleric
  • 6 Flying Kobolds
  • 4 Guard Drakes
  • 2 Kobolds with Daggers
  • 2 Kobolds with Fire Bombs
  • 2 Kobolds with Glue Bombs
  • 2 Kobolds with Slings
  • 2 male Bezerkers
  • 2 Male Cultists
  • Male Cultist Sleeping
  • 4 Male Human Guards
  • 2 Male Hunters
  • Roper
  • Roper, Hidden
  • 4 Stirges
  • 4 Troglodytes
  • 2 Vilet Fungi
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
